3,PR,PROTECT (PR),,3.6,PR.PT,Protective Technology (PR.PT),"Protective Technology (PR.PT): Technical security solutions are managed to ensure the security and resilience of systems and assets, consistent with related policies, procedures, and agreements.",3.6.1,PR.PT-1,Protective Technology: Logging (PR.PT-1),"PR.PT-1: Audit/log records are determined, documented, implemented, and reviewed in accordance with policy"
3,PR,PROTECT (PR),,3.6,PR.PT,Protective Technology (PR.PT),"Protective Technology (PR.PT): Technical security solutions are managed to ensure the security and resilience of systems and assets, consistent with related policies, procedures, and agreements.",3.6.2,PR.PT-2,Protective Technology: Removeable Storage (PR.PT-2),PR.PT-2: Removable media is protected and its use restricted according to policy
3,PR,PROTECT (PR),,3.6,PR.PT,Protective Technology (PR.PT),"Protective Technology (PR.PT): Technical security solutions are managed to ensure the security and resilience of systems and assets, consistent with related policies, procedures, and agreements.",3.6.3,PR.PT-3,Protective Technology: Access Control (PR.PT-3),"PR.PT-3: Access to systems and assets is controlled, incorporating the principle of least functionality"
3,PR,PROTECT (PR),,3.6,PR.PT,Protective Technology (PR.PT),"Protective Technology (PR.PT): Technical security solutions are managed to ensure the security and resilience of systems and assets, consistent with related policies, procedures, and agreements.",3.6.4,PR.PT-4,Protective Technology: Network Protection (PR.PT-4),PR.PT-4: Communications and control networks are protected
4,RC,RECOVER (RC),,4.1,RC.RP,Recovery Planning (RC.RP),Recovery Planning (RC.RP): Recovery processes and procedures are executed and maintained to ensure timely restoration of systems or assets affected by cybersecurity events.,4.1.1,RC.RP-1,Recovery Planning: Execution (RC.RP-1),RC.RP-1: Recovery plan is executed during or after an event
4,RC,RECOVER (RC),,4.2,RC.IM,Improvements (RC.IM),Improvements (RC.IM): Recovery planning and processes are improved by incorporating lessons learned into future activities.,4.2.1,Improvements: Lessons Learned (,Improvements: Lessons Learned (RC.IM-1),RC.IM-1: Recovery plans incorporate lessons learned
4,RC,RECOVER (RC),,4.2,RC.IM,Improvements (RC.IM),Improvements (RC.IM): Recovery planning and processes are improved by incorporating lessons learned into future activities.,4.2.2,RC.IM-2,Improvements: Strategy (RC.IM-2),RC.IM-2: Recovery strategies are updated
4,RC,RECOVER (RC),,4.3,RC.CO,Communications (RC.CO),"Communications (RC.CO): Restoration activities are coordinated with internal and external parties, such as coordinating centers, Internet Service Providers, owners of attacking systems, victims, other CSIRTs, and vendors.",4.3.1,RC.CO-1,Communications: Recovery (RC.CO-1),RC.CO-1: Recovery activities are communicated to internal stakeholders and executive and management teams
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.1,RS.RP,Response Planning (RS.RP),"Response Planning (RS.RP): Response processes and procedures are executed and maintained, to ensure timely response to detected cybersecurity events.",5.1.1,RS.RP-1,Response Planning: Execution (RS.RP-1),RS.RP-1: Response plan is executed during or after an event
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.2,RS.CO,Communications (RS.CO),"Communications (RS.CO): Response activities are coordinated with internal and external stakeholders, as appropriate, to include external support from law enforcement agencies.",5.2.1,RS.CO-1,Communications: Roles (RS.CO-1),RS.CO-1: Personnel know their roles and order of operations when a response is needed
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.2,RS.CO,Communications (RS.CO),"Communications (RS.CO): Response activities are coordinated with internal and external stakeholders, as appropriate, to include external support from law enforcement agencies.",5.2.2,RS.CO-2,Communications: Event Reporting (RS.CO-2),RS.CO-2: Events are reported consistent with established criteria
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.2,RS.CO,Communications (RS.CO),"Communications (RS.CO): Response activities are coordinated with internal and external stakeholders, as appropriate, to include external support from law enforcement agencies.",5.2.3,RS.CO-3,Communications: Information Sharing (RS.CO-3),RS.CO-3: Information is shared consistent with response plans
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.2,RS.CO,Communications (RS.CO),"Communications (RS.CO): Response activities are coordinated with internal and external stakeholders, as appropriate, to include external support from law enforcement agencies.",5.2.4,RS.CO-4,Communications: Coordination (RS.CO-4),RS.CO-4: Coordination with stakeholders occurs consistent with response plans
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.2,RS.CO,Communications (RS.CO),"Communications (RS.CO): Response activities are coordinated with internal and external stakeholders, as appropriate, to include external support from law enforcement agencies.",5.2.5,RS.CO-5,Communications: External Information Sharing (RS.CO-5),RS.CO-5: Voluntary information sharing occurs with external stakeholders to achieve broader cybersecurity situational awareness
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.3,RS.AN,Analysis (RS.AN),Analysis (RS.AN): Analysis is conducted to ensure adequate response and support recovery activities.,5.3.1,RS.AN-1,Analysis: Detection Investigation (RS.AN-1),RS.AN-1: Notifications from detection systems are investigated 
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.3,RS.AN,Analysis (RS.AN),Analysis (RS.AN): Analysis is conducted to ensure adequate response and support recovery activities.,5.3.2,RS.AN-2,Analysis: Impact (RS.AN-2),RS.AN-2: The impact of the incident is understood
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.3,RS.AN,Analysis (RS.AN),Analysis (RS.AN): Analysis is conducted to ensure adequate response and support recovery activities.,5.3.3,RS.AN-3,Analysis: Forensics (RS.AN-3),RS.AN-3: Forensics are performed
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.3,RS.AN,Analysis (RS.AN),Analysis (RS.AN): Analysis is conducted to ensure adequate response and support recovery activities.,5.3.4,RS.AN-4,Analysis: Incident & Response Plan Alignment (RS.AN-4),RS.AN-4: Incidents are categorized consistent with response plans
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.4,RS.MI,Mitigation (RS.MI),"Mitigation (RS.MI): Activities are performed to prevent expansion of an event, mitigate its effects, and eradicate the incident.",5.4.1,RS.MI-1,Mitigation: Incident Containment (RS.MI-1),RS.MI-1: Incidents are contained
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.4,RS.MI,Mitigation (RS.MI),"Mitigation (RS.MI): Activities are performed to prevent expansion of an event, mitigate its effects, and eradicate the incident.",5.4.2,RS.MI-2,Mitigation: Incident Mitigation (RS.MI-2),RS.MI-2: Incidents are mitigated
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.4,RS.MI,Mitigation (RS.MI),"Mitigation (RS.MI): Activities are performed to prevent expansion of an event, mitigate its effects, and eradicate the incident.",5.4.3,RS.MI-3,Mitigation (RS.MI-3),RS.MI-3: Newly identified vulnerabilities are mitigated or documented as accepted risks
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.5,RS.IM,Improvements (RS.IM),Improvements (RS.IM): Organizational response activities are improved by incorporating lessons learned from current and previous detection/response activities.,5.5.1,RS.IM-1,Improvements: Response Plans (RS.IM-1),RS.IM-1: Response plans incorporate lessons learned
5,RS,RESPOND (RS),,5.5,RS.IM,Improvements (RS.IM),Improvements (RS.IM): Organizational response activities are improved by incorporating lessons learned from current and previous detection/response activities.,5.5.2,RS.IM-2,Improvements: Response Strategies (RS.IM-2),RS.IM-2: Response strategies are updated
